Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppRegistry
    Global registry storing main information like Common position objects and Map
    Controller
    Controller Class Handles game flags : check, checkmate, player to move, etc
    Executor
    Executor deals with executing moves, undo and redo when controller calls.
    Move
    Stores all information needed to execute or undo a move.
